title: Sri Lankan President declares Public Emergency with effect from 1st April
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has declared a Public Emergency in Sri Lanka with effect from the 1st of April 2022.
Sri Lankan President declares Public Emergency with effect from 1st April
21 Mirihana Protestors granted bail; 6 others remanded to 4th April for identification parade
